official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to require that 30 percent of the amounts granted for construction of treatment works in a State be used in labor surplus areas.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to require that 30 percent of amounts granted for treatment works construction in a State be used in labor surplus areas.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to require that 30 percent of the amounts granted for construction of treatment works in a State be used in labor surplus areas.
